input.sentences: it was the scottish games this weekend . my family decided to attend and were prepared enough to bring sunglasses .
my brother-in-law was competing so my son went to wish him luck .
after that | he ran around the street | pretending to be in the games .
he started to fuss a little bit because he lost his sunglasses while running around earlier .
my father used his hand to block the sun in his eyes and that seemed to quiet him down .
output.sentences: They were ready for the solar eclipse.
They went shopping yesterday for sunglasses.
They took their Grandfather's vintage car.
At the park, they grew excited.
And they watched the skies eagerly.
